description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Acton, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Elegant Central Canberra Escape in the Heart of New Acton with Onsite Italian Trattoria
hotels.description: Tucked away amid the New Acton precinct's stylish bars, glam restaurants and quirky entertainment venues, Canberra’s hidden gem sets the standard for pure indulgence. Peppers Gallery Hotel Canberra’s unique 'gallery' theme ensures a one-of-a-kind stay, with a sculpture garden that spills into the foyer, wall hangings and art installations that turn corridors into creative spaces. Take in the full Canberra experience with tailored culinary moments and immersive cultural experiences on your doorstep, with your hotel located near Lake Burley Griffin and within walking distance of Parliament House. Indulge in a bespoke gourmet experience at the hotel's renowned Canberra institution, the acclaimed Italian trattoria, Bicicletta.

seo.title: Hoteles en Acton - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Acton, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
